Detailed Description

An interface class which abstracts the behavior of recording data.

Definition at line 20 of file NTee.hpp.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void ntee::Recorder::record ( const Socket &  from,
const Socket &  to,
const char *  buf,
size_t  len 
) [pure virtual]

Called once for each message transferred by the NTee instance. Durning this callback the Recorder implementation should transfer the message data to its target.

Parameters:
from Message data is coming from this Socket.
to Message data is going to be sent to this Socket.
buf The message buffer itself.
len Size of the message buffer.

Implemented in ntee::BinaryDataRecorder, and ntee::FileRecorder.

virtual void ntee::Recorder::shutdown (  )  [pure virtual]

Called when all the sockets have closed and there is no more information to be recorded. This allows the Record implementation the opportunity to gracefully shut itself down, and return any resources.

Implemented in ntee::BinaryDataRecorder, and ntee::FileRecorder.
